import React, { useState } from "react"; import 'react-bulma-components/dist/react-bulma-components.min.css'; import './styles/main.css'; import { Navbar, Hero, Container, Heading, Columns, Image, Level, Section, Icon } from 'react-bulma-components'; // import NavBar from "./components/NavBar"; class App extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = this.getInicialState(); } state = { active: false } getInicialState = () => { const inicialState = { active: false }; return inicialState; }; toggleActive = () => { this.setState({ active: !this.state.active, }); }; render() { return ( <> Skills Projects Contact Full stack JS Developer and Web Designer I love developing and designing things for people

A little about Andrés, me

I started my journey as a programmer in highschool in 2006, after that I have always love the web and I really love to build web and mobile app. I have had the oportunity to build some websites for friends work in the backend for AI companies and build mobile apps for others. I really enjoy learning new things and I love interesting projects.

); } } export default App;
